resources.string: This is the final Project for ALC 2.0 Android Beginner Track (Take-a-climb-challenge).\n\nIt is an Intelligent Tic-tac-toe game that supports playing with the computer(singleplayer) and playing with another person (Multiplayer). The game has simple Artificial Intelligence implementations which makes the Computer play the game of tictactoe perfectly.

Ismail Nurudeen is an Intelligent Android Developer,Web Developer and a Teens Development Advocate. He has developed a few problem solving apps and is currently developing moreâ€¦\n Read More about him at:
Tic-tac-tac is a Two Player game played on a 3x3 or 5x5 grid. the first player who succeeds in playing three of his mark/symbol in a horizontal,vertical or diagonal row wins the game.

Zoom in icon- To zoom in the game board
Zoom out icon-To zoom out the game board
restart button-To restart game
 help -To open this dialog
settings button - use the settings button to change your game preferences,like Sound,difficulty level and game theme.
 Learn more at:
Play sound when box is clicked
